howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From booking to arrival, we've streamlined every detail for a seamless experience
howItWorks.step1Desc: Share your itinerary via WhatsApp, phone, or our booking form. Receive a fixed-price quote within 30 minutes.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Once confirmed, your dedicated chauffeur details arrive 24 hours before pickup. No surge pricing, no surprises.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Your driver greets you by name with a discreet digital name board. Luggage assistance included.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Complimentary Godiva pralines, bottled water, phone chargers, and Wi-Fi in all vehicles. Adjust climate and music to your preference.

journeyIncludes.title: Every Journey Includes
journeyIncludes.subtitle: Premium inclusions as standard, because luxury should never be an add-on
journeyIncludes.fixedPricingDesc: No hidden fees or surge pricing
journeyIncludes.customRequestsDesc: Child seat, champagne, EU Quarter priority routes

popularDestinations.title: Popular Destinations
popularDestinations.subtitle: Discover Belgium's most sought-after locations and cross-border hubs with our premium chauffeur service
popularDestinations.notLimitedDesc: We provide exclusive chauffeur services throughout Belgium, the Benelux Union, and neighboring countries including France, Germany, and the United Kingdom. Contact us for custom routes and special requests.
popularDestinations.courchevelDesc: Cross-border luxury to the City of Light
